DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective observational study will evaluate the hemoglobin levels in patients with renal anemia over 6 months treatment with Mircera (methoxy polyethylene glycol-epoetin beta).
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Observational Study of Hemoglobin Levels in Patients With Renal Anemia Treated With Mircera (Methoxy Polyethylene Glycol-Epoetin Beta)
DOC.criteria: Adult patients, >/= 18 years of age Renal anemia treated with Mircera for at least 6 months before entering study Patients who refuse or are incapable of giving their written informed consent to retrospective data collection
